nodes.text: Novacrown was a two-player board game that looked very similar to chess. It involved each player moving their solid pieces strategically on a black and white checkered board. The pieces resembled creatures. One player's set of pieces was light blue, while the other's was purple.
Lando Calrissian and Luke Skywalker played this game at least once on the Millennium Falcon.

In the two illustrations of the gaming board seen in the comic, one represents the board to be eight squares in length on one side, while the other shows the dimensions of the board to be ten by twelve squares.
